message: When attempting to embed vimeo videos using their newer iframe embed, I get an REXML error.

REXML could not parse this XML/HTML: 
<iframe src="http://player.vimeo.com/video/28408829?title=0&byline=0&portrait=0&color=f1f1ef" width="400" height="225" frameborder="0" webkitAllowFullScreen mozallowfullscreen allowFullScreen></iframe>
Looks like an issue with Maruku/markdown.
you can change markdown engine by installing a different gem (say: gem install rdiscount), requiring it in your config.rb and setting: "set :markdown_engine, :rdiscount"
rdiscount worked.  I was looking at some other Markdown options and they bombed too.  Thanks!
